ygData.subject: Begining of a Rogue

Quickstrike:




The air felt more haunting and lonely a few days after the killing of 
Rowdy Wolf. There was something out there, he knew it. If it was 
another like the dire wolf, he would fight for his life and make sure 
it would end up like him.

He kept the reaper, and used it like a walking stick to test out the 
deepness of the snow. At morning, the presence got stronger. It was 
real and a living thing. 

Primus! And a bot!

Quickstrike turned to his defensive aggression. He saw a dark, large 
figure slowly approaching through the snow. It spoke to him to run 
and escape, because she---she could deal with it. It was a deadly 
wolf she was looking for---Rowdy Wolf.

She sent images through his mind, something that spooked him, and 
sent his dizzy spells spiraling wildly. He nearly lost his balance.

She uged him to know who he was. When he did, she send madness 
through the air. He was the snake-bot with the herum to her when she 
first came around. He shot back weakly that he was not just a snake, 
he was more than one ferious beast. There was no way she knew him. He 
shot back that he was a high rank, with only one female that was his 
mate and leader. 

She remembered him as the snake bot with a screaming past. She sent 
back the image of the dragon that was Megatron.

"Shut up!" he screamed. He tried to blank out his mind, to stop her. 

Sooner or later, the bot approached him. It was a black horse-bot. 
Her name was Wildfire. Her mane was tangled and sticky from sap. She 
was looking for Rowdy Wolf to kill him, but he beat her to it. 

They spoke to each other without speaking. It was something that 
Quickstrike thought he could never do. It was something Tarantulas 
could do, but he was actually speaking telepathicly with the help of 
this horse-bot.

He touched her shoulder, then that was when the world came to him. 
New feelings and sensations went through his mind and body. Wildfire 
became his link to the world.
